events.1712: Jeremias Van Riemsdijk, Governor General of Dutch Indies (1775-77), was born.
events.1861: Chintaman Vinayak Vaidya, historian and researcher, was born.
events.1879: Branch of 'Theosophical Panth' established in India.
events.1906: Depressed Classes Mission Society' was established by Vitthal Ramji Shinde.
events.1919: W. A. Sangma, leader of Meghalaya, was born.
events.1925: Narayandatt Tiwar, former Central minister and Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh, was born.
events.1927: Ramesh Vithaldas Divecha, cricketer (11 wickets for India in early 50's), was born in Bombay.
events.1928: Roshan Harshadlal "Deepak" Shodhan, cricketer (century on Test debut for India), was born in Ahmedabad.
events.1952: Vinoo Mankad takes 13 Pakistan wickets to win first Indo-Pak clash.
events.1968: Narendra Deepchand Hirwani, cricketer (Ind leggie 16 wickets vs WI on debut in 1988), was born in Gorakhpur.
events.1980: The first Himalayan Car Rally of 5,377.9 km was started from Brabourne Stadium, Bombay with 74 starters.
events.1983: Vijay Manjrekar, cricketer 55 Tests for India, 3208 runs @ 39.12, died.
events.1992: Zimbabwe's first Test match vs India at Harare.
events.1993: Mandakini Athvale, first child actor of Indian film industry, died.
events.1995: Baby Naaz (Anuradha Bhakkar), famous child actor, died.
events.1996: Vigyan Bhawan in Delhi to be the venue for the trial of former PM Rao.
events.1997: Prince Philip switches on the internet version of Malayala Manorama and The Week at Kochi.
events.2000: Ram Vilas Paswan, Union Communications Minister, announces relief for phone users. New links to cost Rs. 2,000 in urban areas and Rs. 500 in rural areas.
